page.title: 04HOME LIFE IN SWINFORD
page.content:
A Sunday in the{life of one family}- two adults - two children aged eight and three, living in a modern house in Swinford.
{ 7.00 a.m.}Woke up, watched television { 8.30 a.m.}Breakfast { 9.00 a.m.}Weekly telephone call to Grandad {11.00 a.m.}Went to Sunday School in village hall {12.00 noon}Outing to Charlecote Park in Warwickshire { 1.30 p.m.}Picnic lunch { 6.00 p.m.}Home for dinner, roast beef, kidney beans and rhubarb crumble { 8.00 p.m.}Children's bedtime { }Parents relax at home watching television {11.30 p.m.}Parents' bedtime
